definition: The Phantom of the Opera by Andrew Lloyd Webber

sentences.english: There are so many great shows playing; Phantom of the Opera.
sentences.chinese: 那裏好看的表演太多了，比如說《歌劇魅影》。

sentences.english: You tell the other clans to come. Tell them Toruk Makto calls to them!
sentences.chinese: 通知別的種族，通知他就說是魅影騎士在召喚他們。

sentences.english: This is what I call not having a specular image.
sentences.chinese: 這就是我所謂的沒有自我理想的魅影意象。

sentences.english: However, Gerard Butler may disappoint many audiences as the Phantom.
sentences.chinese: 然而，謝拉畢拿飾演的魅影或許令不少觀衆失望。

sentences.english: Raoul tries to tell her there is no Phantom of the Opera.
sentences.chinese: 拉烏包爾試着告訴她說沒有戲院魅影。

sentences.english: JAKE, standing next to the Leonopteryx, watches his army gathering.
sentences.chinese: 傑克，站在魅影身邊，看着他的軍隊集結着。

sentences.english: You tell that Turok Makto calls to them.
sentences.chinese: 就說魅影騎士召喚他們。

sentences.english: This is Phantom of the Opera on Leaf Trombone .
sentences.chinese: 這是“葉子長號上的歌劇魅影”。

sentences.english: However, a more secret behind the curtain is really fierce, evil spirit shadow is heavy.
sentences.chinese: 然而，一個更加隱祕的幕後真兇，魅影重重。

sentences.english: Perform the "Phantom of the Opera" and the "Mission Impossible" in the guest interflow session.
sentences.chinese: 於交流演出環節演奏“歌聲魅影”及“職業特攻隊”。

sentences.english: You tell the other clans to come. Tell them Toruk Makto calls to them!
sentences.chinese: 告訴別的種族，告訴他就說是魅影騎士在召喚他們。

sentences.english: JAKE takes Neytiri’s hand and runs to the leonopteryx.
sentences.chinese: 傑克拉着奈提莉的手跑向魅影。

sentences.english: The Phantom of the Opera has delighted theatergoers for almost twenty years.
sentences.chinese: 《歌劇魅影》近二十年來娛樂了廣大歌劇愛好者。

sentences.english: I saw Phantom once where we didn't do lottery
sentences.chinese: 我看過《歌劇魅影》，那時我們沒用抽獎的方法。

sentences.english: His body shimmers in faceted clear crystal with two star-shaped buttons in Golden Shadow crystal.
sentences.chinese: 透明切割水晶身體配上兩顆星形金色魅影水晶鈕釦。

definition: Xuan Yuan, personal name of Huangdi, the Yellow Emperor 黃帝|黄帝[Huang2 di4]
Asura, malevolent spirits in Indian mythology
Blue Dragon, other name of the Azure Dragon 青龍|青龙 (the seven mansions of the east sky)
lit. devils' castle/place occupied by sinister forces
